code: var sortedData=function sortedData(data,key){var result=[];if(key==='name'){result=data.sort(function(a,b){var aName=a.name.toLowerCase(),bName=b.name.toLowerCase();if(aName<bName){return-1;}if(aName>bName){return 1;}return 0;});}else{result=data.sort(function(a,b){return a.mobile-b.mobile;});}return result;};export default sortedData;
